description: This file manages the storage and retrieval of access tokens in local storage for authentication purposes, providing functions to get, set, and clear the token.

methods.name: getStoredToken()
methods.description: Retrieves the stored access token from local storage.

methods.name: setStoredToken(token)
methods.description: Stores an access token in local storage.

methods.name: clearStoredToken()
methods.description: Removes the stored access token from local storage.
